explanation:
code_hardening: none.
resolve_compilation_errors: Renamed the constructor to DynamicSingleSeriesPlot and ensured it matches the existing class name that extends org.jfree.ui.ApplicationFrame, allowing the call to super(title). All referenced fields, constants, and methods (timer, COUNT, FAST, SLOW, START, STOP, gaussianData(), randomValue(), createChart(...)) are already declared in the class, and all Swing and JFreeChart types are available via existing imports.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: none; the constructor logic, UI setup, and timer behavior are preserved exactly as in the source snippet.
refactoring: Renamed the constructor from DTSCTest to DynamicSingleSeriesPlot to align with Java naming conventions and the existing class name.
misc: none.
